nodes.title: Patterned Tee

nodes.description: Collared shirt featuring long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Button-up front hidden by a placket.

nodes.description: Oversize collared shirt made of gabardine fabric. Long sleeves with double cuffs. Asymmetric pocket on the front. Contrast topstitching detail. Button-up front.
nodes.title: Effortless fit

nodes.description: Collared shirt made of gabardine-type fabric. Featuring long cuffed sleeves and patch pockets on the front. Button-up front fastening.
nodes.title: Relax Fit

nodes.description: Cropped collar shirt featuring long sleeves with cuffs. Fabric with contrast patches. Chest pocket. Snap-button fastening hidden by a placket.
nodes.title: Patch Trend

nodes.description: Collared shirt with long sleeves. Front patch pockets with flaps. Button-up front hidden by a placket.

nodes.description: Collared shirt with long sleeves. Dart detail at the back. Front rhinestone button fastening.

nodes.description: SLIM FIT - MOCK NECK - NORMAL LENGTH - 3/4 SLEEVEST-shirt made of a cotton blend. Mock neck and 3/4 sleeves.
nodes.title: MOCK NECK

nodes.title: MODAL CROPPED

nodes.title: CROPPED POLYAMIDE

nodes.description: SLIM FIT - ROUND NECK - NORMAL LENGTH - SHORT SLEEVESRound neck T-shirt with short sleeves.
nodes.title: FITTED FADED

nodes.description: REGULAR FIT - ROUND NECKLINE - NORMAL LENGTH - SHORT SLEEVEST-shirt made of a cotton blend. Round neckline and short sleeves. Seamless trims.
nodes.title: INVISIBLE FINISH

nodes.description: Effortlessly chic, this button-down shirt is perfect for elevated outfits. Made with long sleeves and detailed with a notched collar. Crafted from a viscose blend for a smooth, weightless feel and cut in a classic fit.
nodes.title: Gentle Touch

nodes.description: Crafted completely from compact cotton, this V-neck sweater is designed for comfortable, everyday wear. Made with long sleeves and features ribbed styling along the neckline and the hem. Finished with CK monogram logo embroidery at the upper chest.
nodes.title: Calm Raven

nodes.description: An updated take on the classic cable knit sweater, this top is designed with a cropped length. Made with long sleeves and a crewneck. Detailed with wide ribbed styling for added dimension and texture.
nodes.title: Snug Knit

nodes.description: A cotton sweater styled with long sleeves and a crewneck. Detailed with ribbed styling at the neckline, cuffs, and hem. Finished with CK monogram logo embroidery at the upper chest.
nodes.title: Soft Noir

nodes.description: A cotton sweater styled with long sleeves and a crewneck. Detailed with ribbed styling at the neckline, cuffs, and hem.
nodes.title: Silky Ebony

nodes.description: A cotton sweater styled with long sleeves and a crewneck. Detailed with ribbed styling at the neckline, cuffs, and hem. Finished with CK monogram logo embroidery at the upper chest.
nodes.title: Sleek Jet

nodes.description: Crafted from a fine merino wool blend, this sweater is designed with a lightweight construction featuring a soft, refined touch. Made with long sleeves and a crewneck. Finished with ribbed detailing along the sleeve cuffs and hem.
nodes.title: Midnight Cozy

nodes.description: Crafted from a fine merino wool blend, this sweater is designed with a lightweight construction featuring a soft, refined touch. Made with long sleeves and a crewneck. Finished with ribbed detailing along the sleeve cuffs and hem.
nodes.title: Classic Shadow

nodes.description: Crafted from a fine merino wool blend, this sweater is designed with a lightweight construction featuring a soft, refined touch. Made with long sleeves and a polo collar. Finished with ribbed detailing at the hem and the sleeve cuffs.
nodes.title: Modern Slate

nodes.description: Crafted from a fine merino wool blend, this sweater is designed with a lightweight construction featuring a soft, refined touch. Made with long sleeves and a polo collar. Finished with ribbed detailing at the hem and the sleeve cuffs.
nodes.title: Elegant Charcoal

nodes.description: A modern cotton zip hoodie crafted with cotton stretch fabric, classic logo styling and ribbed knit detailing for a youthful, sporty design.
nodes.title: Dream Zip

nodes.description: Shaped in a boxy silhouette, this hoodie is designed with logo tape styling along the upper sleeves and a zip closure along the front. Made with ribbed detailing at the cuffs and hem. Crafted from a recycled polyester blend for reduced environmental impact.
nodes.title: Easy Go

nodes.description: Crafted from a cotton and recycled polyester blend, this sweatshirt is made with reduced environmental impact and soft comfort in mind. Designed with long sleeves and a mock neck. Cut with a boxy fit for a slightly oversized silhouette.
nodes.title: Cool Blackberry

nodes.description: Crafted from an extra soft cotton blend fleece, this sweatshirt offers a cozy feel. Designed with a quarter-zip closure and a mockneck. Features ribbed texture at the collar, cuffs, and hem. Styled with a kangaroo pocket at the front and finished with a CK monogram logo at the chest.
nodes.title: ZipChill Top

nodes.description: A timeless design, straight from the archive. Designed with a retro-inspired embroidered archive logo, this hoodie sweatshirt features a plush cotton knit fleece blend for premium, all-day comfort. Cut in a relaxed fit with a fine ribbed knit trim.
nodes.title: Warm Wrap

nodes.description: Styled in an oversized silhouette, this crewneck sweatshirt is made with drop shoulders for a relaxed fit. Crafted from a cotton fleece blend for soft, plush comfort. Detailed with banded cuffs at the sleeve openings and features a CK monogram logo design at the front.
nodes.title: Warm Hug

nodes.description: Crafted from an extra soft cotton blend fleece, this sweatshirt offers a cozy feel. Designed with a quarter-zip closure and a mockneck. Features ribbed texture at the collar, cuffs, and hem. Styled with a kangaroo pocket at the front and finished with a CK monogram logo at the chest.
nodes.title: Smooth Shadow

nodes.description: Crafted from soft cotton blend fleece, this crewneck sweatshirt offers exceptional comfort with added warmth. Styled with long sleeves and designed with drop shoulders for a relaxed fit. Finished with archive-inspired logo embroidery at the upper chest.
nodes.title: Cozy Crop

nodes.description: A timeless design, straight from the archive. Designed with a retro-inspired embroidered archive logo, this crewneck sweatshirt features a plush cotton knit fleece blend for premium, all-day comfort. Cut in a relaxed fit with fine ribbed knit trim.
nodes.title: Fine Midnight
